data.title: Value Network

content.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"As of November 2023, we are Google Certified Publishing Partner!","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"We are always looking for optimizations and use of the latest technology to make sure that revenues are not only guaranteed but remain consistent over time. We run the best competition for the publisher using very few lines in the ads.txt!","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Our formats, even the most impactful ones, respect the user's navigation being 100% Google compliant, for this reason they do not have a negative impact for the site from an SEO perspective.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Our constant quest for quality is rewarded by the trust that agencies and brands place in us, investing every day in our networ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Campaigns delivered by AdKaora are monitored and verified by leading certification partners in the digital marketplace.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

firstAccordionGroup.title: Fast integration with one click and super easy!

content.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"La nostra tecnologia è sofisticata: ciò che ha richiesto tempo durante il processo di sviluppo, si traduce in un’agile e rapida attività di implementazione richiesta all’editore.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

firstAccordionGroup.title: Premium formats even in AMP environment

content.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Our rich media hosts high-impact engagement creative that enables total user engagement and is available in AMP and WEB environments.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Within AdKaora there is an outstanding sales team that allows us to have premium campaigns designed for your publishing project. Campaigns are distributed equally within the network so that even the smallest publisher is satisfied.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Each website or, even more so, each network has its own peculiarities. The support offered to the publisher must, therefore, be customized based on specific needs. And this is how we work at AdKaora.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"AdKaora invests in the development and expertise of its people; they make the difference and are the company's real assets. As a publisher you will have a dedicated team on a daily basis, always ready to support you and believing in the same goal as you!","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Thanks to our AdKontrol Dashboard, you have full visibility of your revenues, day by day, 24 hours a day, and in total transparency!","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

firstParagraphDescription.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"We are 100% part of the Mondadori Group, Italy's largest publisher, with our international MarTech hub.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"\r\nTogether with Hej!, a company specializing in conversational marketing, and Adgage, a mobile adv company operating in Spain, Portugal and LATAM, we are active abroad with the goal of expanding our products to create new communication opportunities.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

data.scrollingText: Integrate our formats - Earn money with premium campaigns - Control in total transparency

secondParagraphDescription.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Monetize your AMP pages to the best of your ability as well and you will get a boost in revenue! Integration is easy and has one of the highest CPMs on the market. We work to ensure 100% safe and suitable environment for ads.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

thirdParagraphDescription.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"AdKaora allows you to better monetize the pages of your site: you can rely on us for the entire advertising collection or even leverage our expertise to complement your adv activity. Whether it's rich media directly implemented by us or display spaces that are still available, we will be able to enhance them through various sales channels.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

content.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"«La frequenza di delivery e i metodi di chiusura sono essenziali per rendere la user experience meno invasiva. L’impatto con le revenues è importante soprattutto se vendute in reservation.»","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"«L'impatto sulla SEO, se implementata correttamente dall'editore, è nullo. Anche l'impatto sulle Core Web Vitals è regolare, indipendentemente dal tipo di approccio tecnico.»","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"«Il formato adv (Interstitial) ha successo perchè genera interessanti revenues senza incidere sui KPI del sito»","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"«Il formato Interstitial è buono e l'impatto economico è veramente alto, soprattutto se c'è molta domanda e poca offerta di spazio, quel formato vale molto denaro.»","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}
